alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Haralson and north central Carroll Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Bremen, or near Buchanan. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to penny sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Buchanan, Bremen, Temple, Tallapoosa, Mount Zion, Waco and Draketown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
